abstract: Remove a version from App Store review.
overview:
## Discussion

Use this endpoint to remove a version from App Review. This request fails with an appropriate error if the app can’t be removed from review. For more information, see [https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/manage-submissions-to-app-review/remove-a-submission-from-review].

### Remove a Version from App Review

# Delete an App Store Version Submission

**Web Service Endpoint**

Remove a version from App Store review.

## Discussion

Use this endpoint to remove a version from App Review. This request fails with an appropriate error if the app can’t be removed from review. For more information, see [https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/manage-submissions-to-app-review/remove-a-submission-from-review].

### Remove a Version from App Review
title: Delete an App Store Version Submission
